title: Post-upgrade actions failed
content:
During the suite upgrade, after the suite services have been successfully upgraded, an error occurs indicating that the system fails to perform one or more post-upgrade actions.

Cause

This issue may occur in one of the following scenarios:

  • The post-upgrade actions have been completed successfully; however, the system fails to retrieve the correct status of the actions because of a browser refresh made by you. You should not refresh the browser during the suite upgrade.
  • The system fails to complete one or more of the post-upgrade actions. 

Solution

  1. Log in to the OMT Management Portal as admin: https://<external access host>:5443.
  2. Navigate to DEPLOYMENT > Deployments, and then do the following:
    1. Check that the suite version is updated to the new version. 
    2. Check that the suite deployment status is Installed.
    3. Click the More Actions icon for the suite, and check that the Change option is available. 
  3. If everything is fine, the suite upgrade has been completed successfully. Close the upgrade wizard window.  
  4. If anything is wrong (for example, the suite deployment status is Updating or the Change option isn't available), contact the support team for assistance.
